description:
On the Day IELTS Exam Tip：雅思考试当日小贴士：

Be prepared for your IELTS exam by making sure you know exartly what will happen in the day of your test. Check all tips and rules below. 清楚地了解考试当天会发生什么，能帮助你更好地准备雅思考试。请检查下面所有的事项和规则。

1. Sleep & Eat Well
1. The IELTS test is long. It take 2 hours and 40 mins to do the Listening,reading and writing test. There is no break between the tests. Make sure you are well rested and have eaten in order to keep your concentration during your test. 一、 吃好睡好
1.雅思考试的时间很长。做听力、阅读和写作测试需要耗时2小时40分钟。测试中没有中断。确保你考前得到过充分的休息，以便在考试中保持注意力集中。

2. Clothes
1. Wear comfortable clothing. You are not marked on your appearance for any part of the test. So, wear something that you are comfortable in and that gives you confidence.二、衣着
1.穿舒适的衣服。你没有必要把雅思考试的任何部分标记到你的衣着上。所以，穿一些你觉得舒服的衣服来给你自信。

2.The test room might be cold in the aircon is on, so take an extra layer of clothing with you.二、考场可能会因为开着空调而比较冷，因此多带一件衣服吧。

3. Drink
You can take a drink into the exam room as long as it is in a transparent bottle.三、喝水

1.你可以带一个装着水的透明杯子进考场。

4. Arrive Early
1. Make sure you know how long it takes to get to your IELTS test center and exactly where your test will be held. Don't be late or you won't be allowed to enter the exam room. You will need to check in so make sure you arrive with plenty of time to spare.四、提前到达
1.确保你知道去你的雅思考试考场需要多长时间，以及你的考试将在哪里进行。不要迟到，否则你将不被允许进入考场。确保你有足够的空闲时间，因为你将需要到达并且登记进入考场。

5. Toilet
1. The listening，reading and writing tests take 2 hours and 40 mins. There is no break so make sure you go to the toilet before you enter the exam room. If you need the toilet during the test, put your hand up and the invigilator will let you go. But you will lose valuable time by doing this and it could affect your score.五、卫生间
1.听力、阅读和写作会花费2小时40分钟。这中间没有任何的休息，所以在你进考场前你可以去上卫生间。如果在考试期间你想上卫生间，你可以举手让监考员让你去。但是在这期间会浪费你宝贵时间而影响你的分数。

6. No Phones
1. You will not be allowed to take your phone or any other electronic items into the test room. 六、严禁手机
1.手机以及任何其他电子产品，带进考场是不被允许的。

7. Pen, Pencil & Eraser
1. You can take pens, pencils and erasers into your test. You can't take a dictionary or extra paper into the test room. For your speaking test, you can take nothing into the room except your ID.七、钢笔、铅笔和橡皮
1.你可以带钢笔、铅笔和橡皮进入考场。在口语考试时，你只需要带上你的准考证和相应证件就可以。

8.ID
1. Check with your test center exactly what ID you need to take with you.Don't forget it. 八、证件
1.查看你的考试中心确保准随身带上准考证以及相关证件。千万不要忘记。

9. Listen to Instructions
1. Listen careftllly to all instructions given before your test starts. 九、指令
1.在考试开始前，认真听所有的指令。

10. Clock
1. There will be a clock on the exam room. Make sure you know where it is before your test starts so you can keep checking it in your reading and writing test. You can't take your watch into the exam room.十、时钟
1.考试室里会有一个钟，在考试开始前，确保你知道它在哪里，这样你就可以在阅读和写作测试中不断地查看，但你不能把你的手表带进考场。

11. Disability
1. If you have any form is disability that will affect your test, you must speak to the test center well before your test date.十一、残疾
1. 假如你有任何的伤残会影响到你的考试，那么你必须在考前去向考试中心说明。

12. Focus & Be Calm
1. Make sure you go into your test with a clear aim and an understanding of the techniques you need to use. Be calm and confident at all time.十二、专注和冷静
1.确保你进入考场时是带着一个清晰的目标，以及你所要用的技能的充分掌握。在任何时刻都要冷静和自信。
愿你在考试中取得好成绩！
